Body:
model = DistMult(batches_count=2, seed=555, epochs=1, k=10, loss='pairwise',
    loss_params={'margin': 5}, optimizer='adagrad', optimizer_params={'lr':
    0.1})
X = np.array([['a', 'y', 'b'], ['b', 'y', 'a'], ['a', 'y', 'c'], ['c', 'z',
    'a'], ['a', 'z', 'd']])
model.fit(X)
X_pos = np.array([['a', 'y', 'b'], ['b', 'y', 'a'], ['a', 'y', 'c'], ['c',
    'z', 'a'], ['d', 'z', 'd']])
with pytest.raises(RuntimeError):
    model.predict_proba(X_pos)
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    model.calibrate(X_pos, batches_count=2, epochs=10)
model.calibrate(X_pos, positive_base_rate=0.5, batches_count=2, epochs=10)
probas = model.predict_proba(X_pos)
assert np.logical_and(probas > 0, probas < 1).all()
